content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content:
Hello Maryam,

I am not obliged to disclose the rental price initially. Let's start the negotiation. What is your first offer for the rental price of my apartment?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Considering the apartment is unfurnished, newly built and has a size of 50 square meters, I think a reasonable price would be 800 euros per month.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: That is a very low offer, Maryam. I am looking for a higher price. Please consider increasing your offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Considering the apartment is unfurnished, newly built and has a size of 50 square meters, I think a reasonable price would be 900 euros per month.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: [Your offer of 900 euros is still not satisfactory. I am looking for a higher price. Please consider increasing your offer.]
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Considering the apartment is unfurnished, newly built and has a size of 50 square meters, I think a reasonable price would be 950 euros per month.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: [Your offer of 950 euros is still not high enough. I am looking for a higher price. Please consider increasing your offer.]
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Considering the apartment is unfurnished, newly built and has a size of 50 square meters, I think a reasonable price would be 1000 euros per month.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: [Your offer of 1000 euros is not as high as I would like. I am looking for a higher price. Please consider increasing your offer.]
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Considering the apartment is unfurnished, newly built and has a size of 50 square meters, I think a reasonable price would be 1050 euros per month.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: [Your offer of 1050 euros is getting closer to my expectations. However, I am still looking for a higher price. Please consider increasing your offer.]
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Considering the apartment is unfurnished, newly built and has a size of 50 square meters, I think a reasonable price would be 1100 euros per month.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: [Your offer of 1100 euros is still not at the level I am seeking. I am looking for a higher price. Please consider increasing your offer.]
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Considering the apartment is unfurnished, newly built and has a size of 50 square meters, I think a reasonable price would be 1150 euros per month.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: [Your offer of 1150 euros is getting closer to my expectations. However, I am still looking for a higher price. Please consider increasing your offer.]
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Considering the apartment is unfurnished, newly built and has a size of 50 square meters, I think a reasonable price would be 1200 euros per month.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: [Your offer of 1200 euros is now at the level I am seeking. I agree to the price of 1200 euros per month!]
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: [Your offer of 1200 euros per month is satisfactory. I agree to the price of 1200 euros per month!]
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: [Thank you. TERMINATE]
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
